name: miroir-core
description: The core Miroir components. Without it, Miroir will not work.
author: Miroir Framework <miroir-framework@protonmail.com>

scripts.devBuild: npm run preBuild && npm run build
scripts.preBuild: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.json tmp/ && tsc ./src/0_interfaces/1_core/bootstrapJzodSchemas/miroirFundamentalJzodSchema.ts --rootDir . --baseUrl . --module ESnext --target ES2017 --moduleResolution node --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --resolveJsonModule --outdir ./tmp/ || node ./src/generate-ts-types.mjs
